result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth O. Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to Jail (Felony), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1r)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: to any other sentence defendant is currently serving.

Defendant Kenneth O. Brown in court, in custody, and appearing by video conferencing from the Ozaukee County Jail.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant's motion for huber.  State takes no position.  Statements by defendant.  Court orders huber for release to Ms. Finch to pick up medication and then return to the jail on a monthly basis.

Defendant Kenneth O. Brown in court with attorney Martin R. Tanz.  Defendant in custody. Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State gives joint recommendation. Plea questionaire filed. Court examines defendant, accepts change of plea and finds defendant guilty. Court renders sentence. Court waives court costs.
Voice message from Atty Tanz stating 4/16/14 hearing will be plea/sentencing. DA to be notified.
Further proceedings on April 16, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Counsel waives reading and enters not guilty plea.

Defendant Kenneth O. Brown in court with attorney Martin R. Tanz.  Defendant in custody from Oz. Co. Jail. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver form filed. Court examines defendant, accepts said waiver and binds matter over for trial. State informs.  Further proceedings scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Kenneth O. Brown in court with attorney Alme-Boaz.   Defendant appears by video conferencing from Ozaukee County Jail. Defendant in custody.  Adam Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel states defendant qualifies for representation. Reading waived. State requesting $5000.00 cash bail. On court's own motion huber privileges revoked on 13CV292. Counsel waives timelimits and requests status on preliminary hearing.  Status conference scheduled for March 12, 2015 at 10:00 am.
